SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class RMIHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.RMIHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMIHandlerInterface, Remote
public class RMIHandler extends Object implements RMIHandlerInterface

Class that forwards all messages form a RMI Client to the actual Controller.

    • addToBookshelf

      public Message addToBookshelf(int gameID, String playerID, int col) throws RemoteException
      Method that calls the addToBookshelf in the Controller.
      Specified by:
      addToBookshelf in interface RMIHandlerInterface
      Parameters:
      gameID - Key to access the correct game in the HashMap games.
      playerID - Player's username.
      col - Column to add the selected tiles.
      Returns:
      Message from Controller.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - In case the connection fails between Server and RMI Client.
